timeline.body:
1. You could have bucket names as `my-bucketname`, `my-bucketname-in-eu`, `my-bucketname-in-eu-with-object-lock`
2. I prefer longer block in `if` i.e. `if (!minioClient.bucketExists(...)) {` is better.
timeline.bodyText:

timeline.bodyHTML:
1. You could have bucket names as my-bucketname, my-bucketname-in-eu, my-bucketname-in-eu-with-object-lock
  2. I prefer longer block in if i.e. if (!minioClient.bucketExists(...)) { is better.
